data.title: Marin Community Foundation
data.meta_description: Connects the people who want to create change in the world with the organizations that can produce the greatest impact....
data.text:
MCF's New Strategic Vision

MCF is announcing a new vision and mission and is launching two new major strategic initiatives, along with streamlined grantmaking processes, and a refreshed governance structure.

Click on the bear to read more about the results of our recent strategic planning process.

Giving is personal.

Perhaps there’s a cause or an organization that’s special to you. Perhaps giving is a family tradition. Or maybe you want to start a family tradition. Whatever the reason, you want to partner with someone who understands you and your goals and can make your experience easy, effective and joyful.

Welcome to MCF.

We're here to provide access to the people, resources and issue-area expertise to transform your philanthropic ambitions into reality.

2019

Launched the Venture Impact Program, The Family Office of Philanthropy, and The Book of Mom

Launched the Venture Impact Program

An initiative that enables impact investing via grantmaking.

Established The Family Office of Philanthropy

A multi-disciplinary team focused on serving the needs of Virtuoso clients.

Commissioned The Book of Mom

Featuring insights from a human-centered design research project of mothers living in poverty in Marin.
